text: 9|67|namja wiseonjaga geuleohgo yeoja wiseonjaga geuleohageoneul geumgihan geos eun haenghago uimuhwahan geos-eun silcheonchi anihamyeo geudeul-ui sondeul-eul umkyeojwigohananim-eul mang-gaghani geubundo geudeul-eulsaeng-gagchi anihasideola sillo wiseonjadeul-eun haeag-eul kkichineun jadeul-ila
